author: ratz
title: not bad
review: this was the first set i obtained with the new grey colours. even though it is made for kids there are some useful parts like slopes and windows included, which also come in non-basic colours (orange, medium blue).

author: jof
title: could do with a minifig
review:
This is an interesting set.  A few rare coloured pieces, some nice bulk building grey plates for making station platforms etc.  A lot of windscreens & a couple of tinted panels.

6 sets of good big wheels.  (They should have shipped some 1*6 arches to make wheel arches for these wheels).  They go well on 8 brick wide MOC buses made for minifigs.

Down side is no minifig.  It really could have done with a standard 'workman' to operate machinery.

And could have done with a few decent sized plates.
